task.title: Configuring assigning UE usage type (Decor) on IMSI range basis
task.shortdesc: Follow the steps to enable this feature, and set the value for UE usage type in the IMSI range services.

step.cmd: Enable the UE usage source IMSI range in the UE PLMN services.
Configure the value for UE usage type in the IMSI range services.
step.info: Valid values are 1 to 126, or 128 to 255. The default value is 0. The default value is used when no value is configured.
